abstract.p: Draft Worldwide acquires Group III Promotions; Group III will operate as autonomous unit of KBA Marketing division of Draft; Lowe Lintas Columbian is being merged with Draft (S)

block.p: Draft Worldwide in Chicago, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, is growing through an acquisition and a merger.

Draft acquired Group III Promotions in Chicago, an event marketing and promotions agency with 200 employees in 11 offices handling accounts with billings estimated at more than $19 million for clients like Pontiac. Terms were not disclosed.
Draft Worldwide in Chicago, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, is growing through an acquisition and a merger.

Draft acquired Group III Promotions in Chicago, an event marketing and promotions agency with 200 employees in 11 offices handling accounts with billings estimated at more than $19 million for clients like Pontiac. Terms were not disclosed.
Group III will operate as an autonomous unit of the KBA Marketing division of Draft. Larry Diskin, 51, chief executive at Group III, and Vince Parrinello, 45, president, will continue in those posts.

And Lowe Lintas Columbian in Chicago, the direct marketing agency affiliated with Lowe Lintas & Partners Worldwide -- part of the Lowe Group unit of Interpublic -- is being merged with Draft, which specializes in direct marketing. About half of Columbian's 30 employees are transferring to Draft along with the two accounts Columbian has handled, DirecTV and Sears, Roebuck.
